title: DoJ Disrupts North Korean IT Worker Scheme Across Multiple US States
summary: DoJ Disrupts North Korean IT Worker Scheme Across Multiple US States. The US also conducted searches of 29 "laptop farms" across 16 states and seized 29 financial accounts used to launder funds....
content: The US also conducted searches of 29 "laptop farms" across 16 states and seized 29 financial accounts used to launder funds.
